aboutMe.name: Marcos Wiendl
aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Marcos, {{age}} years old. I'm a full stack developer focused on creating digital solutions that combine intuitive interfaces with robust back-ends. I enjoy solving problems with creativity and delivering real value to users.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I recently graduated in Web Development and I'm looking for an opportunity to apply all the knowledge I've acquired. I'm currently pursuing an MBA in Full Stack Web Development. In my free time, I explore new technologies, create personal projects, and follow industry trends.

item1.description: In 2021, I completed the Reserve Officers Training Center (NPOR), where I developed leadership, discipline, teamwork, and decision-making skills under pressure. Throughout the year, I received both practical and theoretical training in tactics, military organization, and logistics, culminating in my appointment as an Reserve Second Lieutenant.

item2.description: I work on the ideation, planning, and execution of academic and multidisciplinary software projects. As a member of LATIM's Projects Committee, I collaborate with diverse teams to develop technological solutions—from requirements gathering to the delivery of functional systems.

project1.title: AuthKit
project1.description: A robust fullstack authentication solution built with Java and NextJS. Features a comprehensive authentication system including login/registration flows, password recovery, protected areas, 2FA support, Passkeys integration, email notifications, and real-time WebSocket notifications. Designed for enterprise-level applications requiring secure and scalable authentication.

details.title: AuthKit - Enterprise Authentication Solution
details.description: AuthKit is a comprehensive authentication solution designed for enterprise-level applications. Built with modern technologies and best practices, it provides a secure and scalable foundation for user authentication and authorization.

project2.title: Finapp API
project2.description: Robust RESTful API built with Java and Spring Boot for personal finance management. Features JWT authentication with refresh tokens, collaborative goals between users, income and expense tracking, real-time balance calculation, and password recovery via email.

details.title: Finapp API - Personal Finance Management
details.description: A comprehensive API for managing personal finances, allowing users to track their income, expenses, and savings goals. The system supports collaborative financial goals and provides real-time balance calculations.

project3.title: Valorize
project3.description: Fixed-income investment simulator supporting major asset types, with charts and progress metrics.

details.title: Valorize - Fixed Income Investment Simulator
details.description: A powerful tool for simulating and analyzing fixed-income investments. The application supports various investment types and provides detailed metrics and visualizations to help users make informed investment decisions.

contact.title: Contact

contact.description2: I'm always open to new challenges and good conversations.
